page.title: 07SHOPPING IN BOURNE
page.content: People in this district need not travel further to buy things necessary to live in comfort.Shopping facilities include three Chain Stores;Woolworths, Boots, Menzies and one Co-operative, the Rainbow Supermarket.In the town centre there are 39 varieties of shops including three small Supermarkets, five private grocers and five green- grocers.On the outskirts of town are three grocers to suit people on housing estates. There are three furniture shops for new comers moving into the area.Fresh bread,cakes,meat and veg. are always available and there are plenty of fast-food shops open until 11pm. Thursday and Saturday market days bring much trade to the town but serious traffic problems.Most people shop in the Rainbow or on market days.
